block.p: HOLZMAN-Matilda. On June 3rd, 2000. Beloved wife of Franklyn D. Holzman. Cherished mother of Thomas Holzman, David Holzman and Miriam Meyer and grandmother of Aaron and Beth Holzman, and Dillon and Andrew Meyer. Beloved sister of Rose Dobrof and sister-in-law of Lawrence Holzman, Bonnie Holzman and Alfred Dobrof. Doting aunt of six.

HOLZMAN-Matilda. We mourn the passing of Matilda Holzman, beloved sister of our Founding Director, Rose Dobrof. Our heartfelt sympathy to Franklyn, their children and to Rose. The Board and Staff of The Brookdale Center on Aging
